decoder._comment_SelectionMode_: Valid modes are 0:off, 1:first program, 2:lowest program num, 3:specific program num, 4:specific program PID
decoder._comment_ProgramNumber_: Used if selection mode is set to 3
decoder._comment_ProgramPID_: Used if selection mode is set to 4
decoder._comment_AudioNumber_: Which program to pull audio from
